author: Fextralife
description:
Nightreign DLC THE FORSAKEN HOLLOWS - Nightreign's First Expansion Announced!
In this Fextralife video, we're going to be talking about the new Nightreign DLC that FromSoftware and Bandai Namco have revealed, The Forsaken Hollows, and it's set to be released on December 4, 2025. And we're going to break down the trailer in this video.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:
0:00 Nightreign the Forsaken Hollows
0:38 New Nightfarers
1:31 New Enemies and Bosses
2:38 New Night Lords
4:00 New Locations and Shifting Earth
8:05 My Opinion
10:41 The Forsaken Hollows DLC Price
11:43 Trailer
